name: Sloth Bros
description:
In this auto-battler game you play as one of the sloth bros and are put against the evil pillow, blanket and teddy bear in many waves of attacks.
As you hit them with your own weapons, they drop caffeinated drinks, that keep you awake.
But beware, even if you dodge every enemy, your energy still drains, so you are dependent on those sweet, sweet caffeinated drops.
Upgrade your weapons through purchases in the shop between rounds.

CONTROLS

Keyboard

SPACE     -     Select

W-A-S-D     -     Movement

ESCAPE     -     Open in-game menu

-----

Gamepad

Left Stick     -    Movement

Buttons     -     Select

Start Button     -     Open in-game menu

Menu navigation     -     Up/ down D-Pad
